item.question:
forte
[fɔːrt]
item.answer:
【考法】 n. 优势，长处：something for which a person shows a special talent
【例】 You are expected to demonstrate your strongest forte in the Statement of Purpose. 在个人陈述中，你应该展示自己最大的优势。
【近】 advantage, eminency, knack, medium, métier, oyster, talent
【反】 inadequacy, incapability, incompetence, inefficiency 不足，弱势
